articles.content: Intranasal COVID-19 vaccines would be easier to administer to school children who bear very mild disease load but are infectious nonetheless, All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) Director … [+1815 chars]

articles.author: hindustantimes.com
articles.title: UK, South Africa, Brazil, US: Variants of SARS-Cov-2 virus found so far - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A new variant has been detected in four persons who travelled from Brazil to Japan. Among these four, two are children, which makes it apparently clear that this variant can infect children as well.
articles.content: The first coronavirus mutation spotted in the United Kingdom has now spread to over 50 countries, according to World Health Organization data. Meanwhile, several other mutations have been reported fr… [+1459 chars]
